PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08412022-06-28NRCAN,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
PrecisReappointment of MELANIE S. DEBASSIGE of M’Chigeeng, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Energy Regulator, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, on a part-time basis, effective August 22, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of MELANIE S. DEBASSIGE of M’Chigeeng, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Energy Regulator, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, on a part-time basis, effective August 22, 2022.
